plot: The serenity of an almost teenager is interrupted by the figure of a woman. For the boy it's a new experience and will seek ways to guide his new feelings.
title: El Despertar
plot_es: The serenity of an almost teenager is interrupted by the figure of a woman. For the boy it's a new experience and will seek ways to guide his new feelings.
plot_en: The serenity of an almost teenager is interrupted by the figure of a woman. For the boy it's a new experience and will seek ways to guide his new feelings.

produce.name: Consejo Para la Cultura y las Artes de Nuevo Leon (Conarte)
